    <section class="content"> 
     <section class="feature-boxes background-wrap white"> 
      <div class="fit-wide"> 
       <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-large title--line-center title--weight-bold title--cap color-darkest acenter mb10">Host ?n ?he Cloud To Keep Growing</h2> 
       <p class="title title--subtitle title--size-semimedium title--weight-normal color-dark title--subtitle-density-large acenter"></p> 
       <div class="grid2 grid--autoflow-row grid--gap-x-large grid--m-2"> 
        <div class="background-wrap pattern--crepe-paper2-pale-blue lazyload border-plus-shadow grid--padding-xx-large flex flex--justify-flex-end flex--direction-column"> 
         <div class="flex--margin-start-top"> 
          <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium color-darkest title--subtitle-density-medium">Guaranteed Resources</h3> 
          <p class="text text--size-medium color-darkest mb30">If your site has outgrown the shared hosting solutions it's time to move to the cloud. Our cloud platform offers powerful dedicated resources and is optimized for efficiency and speed that guarantees a top performance of your site.</p> 
         </div> 
         <div class="modalbox"> <a href="#resources" data-effect="mfp-zoom-in" class="btn btn--bg-transparent-small btn--border-dark btn--size-semi-large btn--text-regular btn--density-large">Learn More</a> 
         </div> 
         <div class="feature-box__icon sg-icon sg-icon--size_144 sg-icon--color-ocean sg-icon--fill-lighter no-display-480"> 
          <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewbox="0 0 144 144">

     <section class="reviews background-wrap pattern--highlight lazyload">

       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="reviews__title"> 
         <h2 class="title title--regular title--size-large title--line-top-left title--weight-bold title--cap color-darkest title--subtitle-density-medium mb10">Trusted by Clients and Industry Experts Alike</h2> 
         <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark pb30">We are hosting 2,000,000 domains while making website owners less stressed, more productive, and hopefully just a little happier. Were honored and humbled by the great feedback we receive from our customers on a daily basis. Were proud to have kept our customer satisfaction rate at 98% and even increasing it every year for the past five years.</p> <a class="btn btn--size-semi-large btn--density-large btn--bg-transparent-small btn--border-dark" href="/siteground_reviews.htm">Read reviews</a> 
        </div>

            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">I moved all my clients WordPress websites to SiteGround hosting a few years ago and it was the best decision I ever made. I can now easily add new clients, new websites, SSL certificates and other features from one dashboard. Through the staging environment, its easy to test new features on your website. With one click you can upload it to the production site. If this fails after all, theres a daily backup that covers you with a one click restore option.</p> 
           </div>

            <p class="text text--size-medium color-dark text--style-italic">I have been a happy customer of SiteGround for 2 years now.      </section>

        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <h4 class="title title--density-small title--weight-medium title--size-semimedium title--regular title--cap color-darkest">Autoscaling to meet unexpected traffic spikes</h4> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">You can also set up automatic scaling for the RAM and the CPU of your cloud. Our unique auto-scale option prevents slowness and downtime in the event of unexpected traffic spikes. If turned on, it will add more resources if your current ones are no longer enough. The added amount is pre-defined by you, so you have full control over auto-scale related charges.</p>

       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between flex--direction-row-reverse density--small no-padding--bottom"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <h4 class="title title--density-small title--weight-medium title--size-semimedium title--regular title--cap color-darkest">Create Client Roles With Custom Set Of Tools</h4> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">With our Client Role feature, you can control which tools will be available to the clients hosted on your cloud. By default, all clients you create receive full access to all management tools in a white label version of our Site Tools.     <div style="display: none;"> <!--Cloud Hosting Modal box--> 
     <div id="dynamic-caching" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-yellow flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">Caching &amp; more</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <h4 class="title title--density-small title--weight-medium title--size-semimedium title--regular title--cap color-darkest">Unique Caching Options</h4> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">WordPress instances hosted on SiteGround are amazingly fast. By default, we enable NGINX Direct Delivery for all sites on our servers, which means that items like your images will load faster from the server memory. Speed up your site even more by using the higher levels of our SuperCacher service and connecting your site with our NGINX-based dynamic cache and Memcached service through our <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/sg-cachepress/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">SG Optimizer plugin</a>.</p> 
        </div>

     <div id="ssh" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-purple flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">SSH &amp; SFTP</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Our free SSH is developed in-house to allow secure account-restricted access. It gives you an encrypted secure connection to your account to manage easily large files and even databases. It is especially useful to administrators and web developers looking to enable direct secure access to their hosting account on the web server. With SSH enabled, you can also take advantage of SFTP for secure file access, transfer and management.</p> 
        </div>

    <div style="display: none;"> <!--Cloud Hosting Modal box--> 
     <div id="dedicated-ip" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-red flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">Dedicated IP</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Each Cloud hosting plan includes a free dedicated IP that is not shared with other users on the same hosting environment. Thus you are safe from having your site being affected from IP blacklist due to other webmasters actions.</p> 
        </div>

     <div id="cloud-backup" class="mfp-with-anim"> 
      <div class="dialog__header dialog__header--pale-blue flex flex--direction-column flex--justify-flex-end"> 
       <h3 class="title title--regular title--weight-medium title--size-medium title--upper color-darkest title--density-extrasmall">Daily backups</h3> 
      </div> 
      <div class="mfp-fit background-wrap white"> 
       <div class="flex flex--justify-space-between"> 
        <div class="dialog__text"> 
         <p class="text text--size-small color-darkest">Sleep easy knowing your site is fully backed up in case of data loss, hacking, or human error. We automatically save daily backups and keep 7 copies of your cloud account. For an additional layer of security these backups may be stored in a data center located in another city, state or country. In addition to our automated backups, customers can generate up to 5 free backups on demand from their control panel. Each of them is kept for 7 days.</p>

    <script type="text/javascript" src="https://d3fjrnfgbgznt3.cloudfront.net/js/swiper/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script> 
    <script>
// Card slider

const swiper1 = new Swiper('.swiper-container--outside', {
  // Optional parameters
  sliderPerView: 1,
  spaceBetween: 20,
  autoHeight: true,
  allowTouchMove: false,

  // Navigation
  navigation: {
    nextEl: '.swiper-button-next-out',
    prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev-out',
  },
});
const swiper2 = new Swiper('.swiper-container--inside', {
  // Optional parameters
  spaceBetween: 20,
  nested: true,
  // Navigation arrows
  navigation: {
    nextEl: '.swiper-button-next',
    prevEl: '.swiper-button-prev',
  },
  breakpoints: {
      0: {
        slidesPerView: 1,
      },
      768: {
        slidesPerView: 2,
      },
      960: {
        slidesPerView: 3,
      },
      1200: {
        slidesPerView: 4,
      },
    },
});

var $prev = $('.swiper-button-prev-out');
var $next = $('.swiper-button-next-out');
    $prev.hide();

$next.click(function () {
    $next.hide();
    $prev.show();
});
$prev.click(function () {
    $prev.hide();
    $next.show();
});

// End Card slider

var currencySymbol = '&#36;';
var currencyId = '1';
var currentParams = {"hdd":40,"mem":8,"cpu":4};

var visitorVat = (100+21)/100;
var priceMulti = 1.0
$(document).ready( function() {
	$('#vatSwitcher a').on('click',function()
		{
			if (inPageVatStatus)
				priceMulti = visitorVat;
			else
				priceMulti = 1.0;

			applyParameterPriceChange();
		}
	);

	$('.create-plan__tab').click(function(event) {
	    event.preventDefault();
		var el = $(this);
		var id = el.attr('id');

		el.siblings().removeClass('active');
		el.addClass('active');
		var plan = el.attr('id').replace('p_','');

		$('.js-plan-block').hide();
		$('.js-plan-block[data-plan='+plan+']').show();
		$('.js-plan-block-title').text($(this).text());

		setParams(plan);
		activateSliders();
		fillSliderDropDowns();
	});

	if (currentPlan)
 		activatePlan(currentPlan);
	else
		activateSliders();
});

function activatePlan( plan )
{
	currentPlan = plan;

	$.each($('.create-plan__tab'),function(id, el){
		if ($(el).attr('id') == 'p_' + plan)
			$(el).trigger('click');
		else
			$(el).removeClass('active');
	});
}

function setParams( plan )
{
	if (!plan || !productPlans[plan])
		plan = currentPlan;

	// params should be cloned, to protect the young padawans
	currentParams = jQuery.extend({}, productPlans[plan]);
}

function activateSliders()
{
	var basePlan = productPlans[1];

	$.each(parametersSettings, function( sliderId, sliderData) {
		var sliderEl = $( '#slider_' +sliderId );
		var sliderMaxEl = sliderEl.find('span.max');
		var currentValue = currentParams[sliderId];
		var minValue = sliderData['min'][datacenterID] ? sliderData['min'][datacenterID] : sliderData['min'][0];
		var maxValue = sliderData['max'][datacenterID] ? sliderData['max'][datacenterID] : sliderData['max'][0];
		var step = sliderData['scale'];


		if (sliderId === 'hdd') {
            step = step * 2;
		}

		// update max value according the current parameter
		if (sliderData.unit === 'GB' && maxValue >= 1000) {
            sliderMaxEl.text(maxValue / 1000 + 'TB');
		} else {
            sliderMaxEl.text(maxValue + sliderData.unitPlural);
		}

		sliderEl.slider({
			value: currentValue,
	    	min: 0,
	    	max: maxValue,
	    	step: step,
	    	range: "min",
	    	slide: function( event, ui ) {
			    if (ui.value < minValue)
			    	return false;

				if (sliderId == 'hdd' && minValue && ui.value < minValue)
			    	return false;

				if (!sliderHandleControl( ui, maxValue, sliderMaxEl, sliderData, sliderId ))
					return false;

				currentParams[sliderId] = ui.value;

				setPlan();
			},
			change: function(event,ui)
			{
				var currentValue = sliderHandleControl( ui, maxValue, sliderMaxEl, sliderData, sliderId );
				if (!currentValue)
					return false;

				$('#' + sliderId + '_label').text(currentValue);

				currentParams[sliderId] = ui.value;

				$('#' + sliderId).val(ui.value);
				$('#' + sliderId + '_total').text(ui.value);
				if (sliderId == 'cpu') {
                    $('#cpu_total_unit').text((ui.value == 1) ? sliderData.unit : sliderData.unitPlural);
				}

				if (sliderId === 'hdd') {
				    $('#hdd_total_unit').text('GB');
				    if (ui.value >= 1000) {
				        $('#' + sliderId + '_total').text(ui.value / 1000);
                        $('#hdd_total_unit').text('TB');
				    }
				}

				applyParameterPriceChange();
				setPlan();
			}
		});
		$('#slider_'+sliderId).slider({ value: currentValue });
	});
}

function setPlan()
{
    var planId = areSlidersOnProductPlan();
    if (!planId) {
        // Custom plan
        setCustomPlan();
        return;
    }

    setExistingPlan(planId);
}

function setCustomPlan()
{
    $('.create-plan__tab').removeClass('active');
    $('.js-plan-block').hide();
    $('.js-plan-block[data-plan=0]').show();
    $('.js-plan-block-title').text('Custom Cloud');
}

function setExistingPlan(planId)
{
    var el = $('#p_' + planId);

    // Show already active plan
    el.siblings().removeClass('active');
    el.addClass('active');
    var plan = el.attr('id').replace('p_','');

    $('.js-plan-block').hide();
    $('.js-plan-block[data-plan='+plan+']').show();
    $('.js-plan-block-title').text(el.text());
}

function applyParameterPriceChange()
{
	var paramsPricePromo 	= calculateParametersPrice(1);
	var monthlyPrice 		= parseFloat(product.sixMonthsPrice) + parseFloat(paramsPricePromo);
	var formatedPrice 		= formatPrice((monthlyPrice * priceMulti).toFixed(2),currencySymbol,currencyId);

	var formatedPrice = formatPrice((monthlyPrice * priceMulti).toFixed(2),currencySymbol,currencyId);
	$( '#sixmonth_monthlyprice' ).html( formatedPrice + '/mo.' );
}

function calculateParametersPrice(plan)
{
	var basePlan = productPlans[plan];
	var billingCycle = product.billing_cycle;
	var billingCycle = 1;
	var totalPrice = 0;
	$.each(currentParams, function( paramName, paramValue ){
	    var price 		= 0;
		var settings 	= parametersSettings[paramName];
		var baseValue 	= basePlan[paramName];
		var paramPrice 	= settings['price'];
		var paramScale 	= settings['scale'];
		var	difference 	= (paramValue - baseValue);

		if (difference > 0) {
		    price = ( difference / paramScale) * paramPrice * billingCycle;
		}

		totalPrice += price;
	});
	return totalPrice;
}

function sliderHandleControl( ui, maxValue, sliderMaxEl, sliderData, sliderId )
{
	var handle = $(ui.handle);
	if (ui.value >= maxValue)
	{
		if (ui.value == maxValue)
			$('#' +sliderId).val(ui.value);

		handle.html('');
		sliderMaxEl.addClass('active');

		if (ui.value == maxValue)
		{
			var unit = (ui.value == 1) ? sliderData.unit : sliderData.unitPlural;
			return ui.value + unit;
		}

		if (ui.value > maxValue)
			return false;
	}
	else
		sliderMaxEl.removeClass('active');

	var unit = (ui.value == 1) ? sliderData.unit : sliderData.unitPlural;
	var currentValue = ui.value + unit;
	if (handle.empty())
		handle.append('<span class="mid">' + currentValue +'</span>');
	else
		handle.children().text(currentValue);

	return currentValue;
}

function areSlidersOnProductPlan()
{
    total_params = 0;
    jQuery.each(currentParams, function( index, value ) {
        total_params = total_params + 1;
    });

    returnPlan = false;
    matched_params = 0;
    jQuery.each(productPlans, function( planIndex, params ) {
        matched_params = 0;
        jQuery.each(params, function( index, value ) {
            if (currentParams[index] == value) {
                matched_params = matched_params + 1;
            }
        });

        if (matched_params == total_params) {
            returnPlan = planIndex;
        }
    });

    return returnPlan;
}

function getThisPlan( planIndex )
{
	var params = currentParams;
	if (typeof planIndex != 'undefined')
	{
		params = productPlans[planIndex];
	}
    var paramUrl = params['cpu'] + ';' + params['mem'] + ';' + params['hdd'];
	var url = "/cloudlxc/order.htm?p=" + paramUrl;
	window.location.href = url;
}

function getCurrentDiscount(billing_cycle)
{
	var discount = billing_cycle == 3 ? 0.95 : (billing_cycle == 6 ? 0.9 : 1);
	return discount;
}

</script> 
   </section> 
  </div>

    <section class="footer__locations grid2 grid--gap-medium grid--sm-2 grid--xs-2"> 
     <div class="flex grid--density-small flex--wrap-column-center-450"> 
      <div class="flex flex--align-center"> <span class="text text--size-xx-small color-lightest"><b>REGION: </b></span> 
       <div class="companylocation" id="localtionSwitcher" tabindex="0"> 
       </div> 
      </div> 
      <div class="payments flex flex--align-center"> <span class="text text--size-xx-small color-lightest"><b>WE ACCEPT: </b></span> 
       <ul class="flex flex--gutter-medium"> 
        <li>
         <svg viewbox="0 0 34 21.5">
          <polygon points="12 15.8 13.7 5.7 16.5 5.7 14.7 15.8 12 15.8" fill="#1a1f71" /><path d="M24.7,6a7.1,7.1,0,0,0-2.5-.4c-2.7,0-4.6,1.4-4.7,3.3S19,11.1,20,11.6s1.4.8,1.4,1.3-.9,1-1.6,1a5.8,5.8,0,0,1-2.6-.5l-.4-.2-.4,2.3a8.7,8.7,0,0,0,3.1.5c2.9,0,4.8-1.4,4.8-3.5s-.7-2-2.3-2.7S20.5,9,20.5,8.5s.5-.9,1.6-.9a5.1,5.1,0,0,1,2.1.4h.2L24.7,6Z" fill="#1a1f71" /><path d="M31.8,5.7H29.6a1.4,1.4,0,0,0-1.4.8l-4.1,9.3H27l.6-1.5h3.5l.3,1.5H34L31.8,5.7Zm-3.4,6.5,1.1-2.8.4-1,.2.9.6,2.9Z" fill="#1a1f71" /><path d="M12.6,5.7,8.3,15.8H5.3L2.9,7A11.6,11.6,0,0,0,0,5.9V5.7H4.5a1.2,1.2,0,0,1,1.2.9l1,4.6L7,12.6,9.7,5.7Z" fill="#1a1f71" />
         </svg></li> 
        <li>
         <svg viewbox="0 0 34 21.5">
          <g id="Layer_2" data-name="Layer 2">
